description.value:
An eidolon grows dangerous claws on its feet, allowing it to make 2 rake attacks on foes it is grappling. These attacks are primary attacks. The eidolon receives these additional attacks each time it succeeds on a grapple check against the target. These rake attacks deal 1d4 points of damage (1d6 if Large, 1d8 if Huge).

This evolution is only available to eidolons of the quadruped base form. This evolution counts as one natural attack toward te eidolon's maximum.

The summoner must be at least 4th level before selecting this evolution.
